resources.string: Ask a volunteer or organizer to unlock the app for you\n(You only need to do this once)
Please contact a volunteer or organizer to get an access code
This app requires permission to access the camera, to be able to scan codes
Please grant permission to access camera
Tap the floating action button to open the scanner. Place the barcode anywhere in the viewfinder and it will be automatically scanned.
Meet the people behind SPIT TechRace 2016\n\n…
